name: Reef Shark
movement: 0 ft. on land, 40 ft. swim speed
description: The Reef Shark is a medium-sized shark with natural armor, showcasing agility and predatory instincts in aquatic settings.
memorable: Its Blood Sense ability allows it to detect injured creatures from great distances, making it a dangerous ambush predator.
goals: To hunt and ambush prey in coastal or underwater environments.
relations: May be encountered alongside other aquatic beasts or in groups where Pack Tactics can be utilized.
environment: Typically found in coastal waters or underwater.
strengths: Highly effective in water due to fast swimming and ability to work in packs.
weaknesses: Immobile on land and vulnerable to lightning damage due to Electrical Sensitivity.
attacks: Bite attack that deals significant piercing damage to prey within reach.
most_powerful_ability: Blood Sense allows it to target wounded animals from 60 feet away or within a mile.
senses: Possesses keen senses that enhance its perception in water.
skills: Proficient in Stealth, enabling ambush tactics.
additional_information: Has advantage on attacks when allies are nearby through Pack Tactics.
Can hide effectively using its bonus action, Stealthy Hunter.
Has a low intelligence, suggesting a strong focus on instinctual hunting.
Incapacitated by lightning damage unless saving throw succeeded.
